Name: MOM
Text: I have heard this neighborhood gives out [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]ALOT[/shake] of [rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]candy.[/rainbow]

Name: MOM
Text: But remeber to avoid any [rainbow freq=0.0 sat=1 val=1]red[/rainbow] candy, I heard it tastes [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]terrible...[/shake]

Name: MOM
Text: You have until [wave amp=25.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]6:00 PM[/wave] before I will pick you up.

Name: MOM
Text: In the meantime, I'm going to drive around for a few.
